
## Effective Width

```{r effective-width, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
ew1 = read_ew(file1, type1)
ew2 = read_ew(file2, type2)
ew.diff = diff_ew(ew1, ew2)
ew.rmse.station = rmse_ew(ew.diff, "Station")
ew.rmse.time = rmse_ew(ew.diff, "Time")

ew.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_ew) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Effective Width Differences at Stations")
ew.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_ew) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Effective Width RMSE at Stations")
ew.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_ew) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Effective Width RMSE Through Time")
```
